name: Eagle
title: The Cyber Hunter
subtitle: A skilled archer who fights alongside his mechanical companion
lore: A master hunter enhanced with cybernetic technology, Eagle fights alongside his mechanical bird companion. Together they rain arrows from above and strike with deadly precision, making them a formidable duo on the battlefield.

passive.name: Faithful Companion
passive.description: Eagle always flies beside you. When activated, it creates an energy burst that pushes away all nearby enemies. Disables your passive and Q ability for [4s]. When Eagle's Faithful Companion is active, Eagle has a bonus [10%] AD.

Q.name: Command: Strike
Q.description: Eagle dives to the targeted location from the sky, stunning all hit enemies for [1.2s] and dealing [80/130/195/300/400] damage. Disables your passive for [4s].

W.name: Rapid Assault
W.description: When activated, Eagle gains [0.25/0.3/0.4/0.5/0.55] attack speed for [3s]. This duration is extended by [3s] for each enemy killed, including minions.

E.name: Triple Arrow
E.description: Fires three arrows into the sky, which land after [1.5s]. If they hit an enemy, they deal [50/105/170/245/400] damage. Additionally, they reduce the healing of hit enemies by [50%] for [4s] and slow them by [40%] MS for [4s].

R.name: Rain of Arrows
R.description: A massive circle where arrows continuously fall from the sky, dealing [300/600/900] damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area.

1.name: Health Shredder
1.description: Eagle's auto-attacks deal bonus damage equal to [2%] of the target's maximum health.

1.name: Hunter's Vision
1.description: Eagle's abilities reveal hit enemies for [4.5] seconds.

1.name: Enhanced Vision
1.description: Increases Eagle's vision radius by 25% and grants Eagle's abilities more range.

5.name: Enhanced Companion
5.description: Eagle now gains bonus [20% AD] of his passive.

5.name: Powerful Strike
5.description: Command: Strike deals an additional [75] damage and its stun duration is increased by 0.35 seconds.

5.name: Arrow Mastery
5.description: Each enemy hit by Triple Arrow reduces the cooldown of all abilities by 1 second.

10.name: Enhanced Rain
10.description: Rain of Arrows deals an additional 100 damage per hit.

10.name: Weakening Rain
10.description: Enemies damaged by Rain of Arrows take [10%] more physical damage for [4s].

15.name: Quick Recovery
15.description: Killing a minion or monster reduces the cooldown of Rapid Assault by 2 seconds.

15.name: Life Drain
15.description: Triple Arrow now also heals Eagle for 100% of the damage dealt.

15.name: Enhanced Speed
15.description: Rapid Assault's attack speed bonus is increased by [0.35].

20.name: Desperate Rain
20.description: Rain of Arrows has [5s] cooldown, but each cast costs 38% of Eagle's current health.

20.name: Protective Companion
20.description: While Faithful Companion is active, Eagle takes [9%] less damage from autoattacks.

20.name: Combat Master
20.description: Increases all damage dealt by Eagle by 15% and reduces damage taken by 10% for 5 seconds after activating Rapid Assault.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
